app_info: WatMap is designed for UW students, for those who want to walk inside
We help you find best route around the campus
If you find our route wrong, use the 'tell us a undiscovered route' in settings page to let us know
declaration: We are not affiliated with UW, this is a student project
We are not responsible for any damage caused by using this app
author information: You can find more interesting things on website https://jia-yx.com (I hope yes)
this is open sourced to github blakejjia/WatMap
